thread.title: Understanding and Help for the Hypersensitive...
thread.title_full: Understanding and Help for the Hypersensitive...

title: Understanding and Help for the Hypersensitive...
text:
Quiz: How Sensitive Are You? Avoid Avoidance! 
Life need not be shunned, becoming a recluse or cautiously keeping yourself sheltered is not the answer. Although avoidance may seem like the best response, it really is the worst action to take. Choosing to avoid encountering harmful stimuli is not the answer. 
The point of living on the planet is to evolve your soul/personality. Spiritual growth is nearly impossible to do without involvement and contact with other people. This means that anyone with a sensitive nature must learn how to survive out in the world amidst energies (or energy drains) that are problematic to them. Help for the Highly Sensitive Person 
Life can become manageable for the HSP. There are a number of ways the HSP can protect himself from harmful energies which can interfere with the joys life can offer.
